mapper.select: SELECT BENEFIT_ID benefitId, USER_ID userId, BENEFIT_DATE benefitDate, BENEFIT_MATCHING_STATE benefitMatchingState, ALBUM_ID albumId, BENEFIT_ALBUM_QUANTITY benefitAlbumQuantity, BENEFIT_CONTENT benefitContent FROM BENEFIT WHERE BENEFIT_ID = #{benefitId}

SELECT BENEFIT_ID benefitId, USER_ID userId, BENEFIT_DATE benefitDate, BENEFIT_MATCHING_STATE benefitMatchingState, ALBUM_ID albumId, BENEFIT_ALBUM_QUANTITY benefitAlbumQuantity, BENEFIT_CONTENT benefitContent FROM BENEFIT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BENEFIT (BENEFIT_ID, USER_ID, BENEFIT_DATE, BENEFIT_MATCHING_STATE, ALBUM_ID, BENEFIT_ALBUM_QUANTITY, BENEFIT_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BENEFIT.NEXTVAL, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{benefitDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{benefitMatchingState, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{albumId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{benefitAlbumQuantity, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{benefitContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
